noun.description: A metal disk with an inscription or design, made to commemorate an event or awarded as a distinction to someone such as a soldier, athlete, or scholar.

verb.description: Earn a medal, especially in an athletic contest.
examples: Norwegian athletes medaled in 12 of the 14 events

origin: Late 16th century: from French médaille, from Italian medaglia, from medieval Latin medalia half a denarius, from Latin medialis medial.
